pattern instructions thumb place held sts on us size 4 3 5mm dpns hold the mitt with the top pointed toward you thumb sts upward with mc and in the space between the thumb you will be adding 2 sts to the thumb starting closest to the sts on the right in brioche pattern see picture below for placement leave a long tail for closing any gaps between stitches when weaving in ends pick up & pick up & knit p2tog w/ yo in in thumb thumb round round 1 mc 1 cc thumb round 1 mc pick up and knit 1 as seen in photo above yo brk sl1yo to end of round stitch count 12 14 16 16 sts thumb round 1 cc sl1yo pick up 1 st purlwise and p2tog with yo as seen in photo above sl1yo brp to end of round thumb round 2 mc brk sl1yo repeat to end of round thumb round 2 cc sl1yo brp repeat to end of round repeat both passes of thumb round 2 for 3 6 7 7 more rounds break cc last round mc k all sts bind off purlwise and break yarn weave in all ends closing any gaps between the thumb and palm wet block to desired
